title: Caught in the Storm
description: Maggie Jacobs left her home in Boston, Massachusetts ten years ago after a falling out with her father. Having been plagued her whole life with the feeling that truth was missing from it, she set out to find some answers. Now, ten years later, Maggie receives a letter from her dead grandmother, urging her to the truth. Maggie is suddenly thrust into a dark world where all of her worst nightmares exist. She is in a race against time to uncover a dark family secret before it takes her life. Will Maggie find the answers before it's too late, or will she find herself Caught in the Storm for an eternity? In this thrilling suspense ride...only time will tell.
author: Amanda M. Wakefield
